dublin_core.dcvalue: Several approaches have been taken to reduce pre antiretroviral therapy ART losses between HIV testing and ART initiation in low and middle income countries but a systematic assessment of the evidence has not yet been undertaken The aim of this systematic review is to assess the potential for interventions to improve or facilitate linkage to or retention in pre ART care and initiation of ART in low and middle income settings
Journal of the International AIDS Society
Interventions to improve or facilitate linkage to or retention in pre-ART (HIV) care and initiation of ART in low- and middle-income settings--a systematic review.
